meanings.definition: slalomers: people who participate in slalom skiing competitions
meanings.sent1: The slalomers raced down the snowy slope with skill and speed.
meanings.sent2: Many slalomers gathered at the mountain for the skiing competition.
meanings.sent3: The slalomers celebrated their victories with hot cocoa by the fireplace.
meanings.sent4: Watching the slalomers glide through the gates was like witnessing poetry in motion.
meanings.sent5: The cheers of the crowd echoed as the slalomers crossed the finish line.

meanings.definition: slalomers: those who navigate a slalom course on skis or snowboards
meanings.sent1: The slalomers weaved through the flags on the course with precision.
meanings.sent2: After practice, the slalomers felt confident in their ability to maneuver the slopes.
meanings.sent3: The slalomers joked about doing a slalom race on a water slide.
meanings.sent4: In the forest, the slalomers moved through the trees like shadows in the night.
meanings.sent5: The slalomers' determination to conquer the course was evident in every turn.
